suncertify.db.server
Interface NetworkService

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractNetworkService, RMINetworkService
public interface NetworkService

Defines the interface for a database engine network service.

It is an implementation specific to suspend any client pending operations when shutdown command is issued to a network service or to wait until they finish. AbstractNetworkService provide a base implementation for this interface.
Registering through addNetworkServiceEventListener(suncertify.db.server.NetworkServiceEventListener) allows reception for stop and start notifications generated by this network service.
An implementation for this interface can be obtained by EngineService interface.

Author:
Mohammad S. Abdellatif
See Also:
NetworkServiceEventListener, AbstractNetworkService, EngineService

Method Summary
 void addNetworkServiceEventListener(NetworkServiceEventListener listener)
          Adds listener to this network service to be notified for network service events.

          Returns database engine which this network service is serving.
 boolean isRunning()
          Returns true if network service is running, otherwise false.
 void removeNetworkServiceEventListener(NetworkServiceEventListener listener)
          Removes listener from this network service so it wont be notified for network service events.
 void start()
          Start the database network service and start accepting new clients.
 void stop()
          Shutdown database server and stop accepting new clients.
 

Method Detail

start

void start()
           throws NetworkServiceException
Start the database network service and start accepting new clients.

Throws:
NetworkServiceException - when starting for server is failed.

stop

void stop()
          throws NetworkServiceException
Shutdown database server and stop accepting new clients.

It is an implementation specific to wait until server clients finished pending operations or not.

Throws:
NetworkServiceException - if shutdown is failed.

isRunning

boolean isRunning()
Returns true if network service is running, otherwise false.

Returns:
returns true if network service is running, otherwise false.

getEngine

Engine getEngine()
Returns database engine which this network service is serving.

It may not returns the same engine instance each time called depending on the running status for this service between calls. Best time to call this method after a successful call to start().

Returns:
services database engine instance.

addNetworkServiceEventListener

void addNetworkServiceEventListener(NetworkServiceEventListener listener)
Adds listener to this network service to be notified for network service events.

Parameters:
listener - listener to be added.

removeNetworkServiceEventListener

void removeNetworkServiceEventListener(NetworkServiceEventListener listener)
Removes listener from this network service so it wont be notified for network service events.

Parameters:
listener - listener to remove.
